metadata.title: Conversation 2
metadata.recording: Conversation recorded on participant's iPhone (regular compressed audio, not lossless)
metadata.context: The participants are husband and wife, chatting at the table after a meal.
metadata.rights: Restricted access: Creators allow academic use.
metadata.sponsors: Uyghur Projects Foundation; UCSB Confucius Institute China Studies Award 2021 (Michael Fiddler); UCSB Humanities and Social Sciences Research Grant 2022 (Michael Fiddler)

annotation.iu: Gerche uyghur xelq naxsh-- naxshilirining da'irisi nahayiti keng bolsimu,
annotation.seg: gerche uyghur xelq naxsh-- naxshi-lir-i-ning da'iri-si nahayiti keng bol-si-mu
annotation.gloss: although Uyghur folk * song-PL-3POSS-GEN scope-3POSS very broad be-COND-INT
annotation.eng: Although the scope of Uyghur folk music is very broad,

annotation.iu: her bir yurtning yoli ayrim bir naxsha némiliri bar emdi.
annotation.seg: her bir yurt-ning yol-i ayrim bir naxsha némi-lir-i bar emdi
annotation.gloss: every one hometown-GEN road-3POSS separate one song what-PL-3POSS exist now
annotation.eng: every town has something distinct about its songs.

annotation.iu: Lékin kucha xelq naxshilirida bir xil,
annotation.seg: lékin kucha xelq naxshi-lir-i-da bir xil
annotation.gloss: but Kucha(city) folk song-PL-3POSS-LOC one type
annotation.eng: But Kucha’s folk music is a kind of

annotation.iu: erlerning aghzidin bolsun meyli ayallarning aghzidin bolsun,
annotation.seg: er-ler-ning aghz-i-din bol-sun meyli ayal-lar-ning aghz-i-din bol-sun
annotation.gloss: man-PL-GEN mouth-3POSS-ABL be-JUSS no.matter woman-PL-GEN mouth-3POSS-ABL be-JUSS
annotation.eng: Whether male singers or female singers,

annotation.iu: yari bilen bille oynighini, shuninglam-- teswirléri jiq.
annotation.seg: yar-i bilen bille oyni-ghin-i shu-ning-lam teswirlér-i jiq
annotation.gloss: lover-3POSS with together play-PTCP.PST-3POSS that-GEN-just description-PL-3POSS many
annotation.eng: time enjoyed with one’s beloved, there are many that describe things like that.

annotation.iu: he kucha xelq naxshilirida asasen héliqi, ayalche naxshilar bek jiq.
annotation.seg: he kucha xelq naxshi-lir-i-da asasen héliqi ayal-che naxshi-lar bek jiq
annotation.gloss: uh Kucha(city) folk song-PL-3POSS-LOC basically that woman-EQU song-PL very many
annotation.eng: Kucha folk music essentially, there are a lot of women’s songs.

annotation.iu: Héliqi ayallarning awazidin, yaki ayallarning éghizidin éytilghan,
annotation.seg: héliqi ayal-lar-ning awaz-i-din yaki ayal-lar-ning éghiz-i-din éyt-il-ghan
annotation.gloss: that woman-PL-GEN voice-3POSS-ABL or woman-PL-GEN mouth-3POSS-ABL sing-PASS-PTCP.PST
annotation.eng: From womens’ voice, or sung by women,

annotation.iu: Naxshining köpinchisi héliqi ayallar éytidu, ayallargha xas bolghan.
annotation.seg: naxshi-ning köpinchi-si héliqi ayal-lar éyt-i-du ayal-lar-gha xas bol-ghan
annotation.gloss: song-GEN majority-3POSS that woman-PL sing-PRES-3 woman-PL-DAT unique be-PTCP.PST
annotation.eng: The majority of songs, women sing them, they belong to women.

annotation.iu: héliqi ayal aptorlar, yaki ayal ijadkarlarning, jiq-- jiq bolushini dep qaraymen.
annotation.seg: héliqi ayal aptor-lar yaki ayal ijadkar-lar-ning jiq jiq bol-ush-i-ni de-p qara-y-men
annotation.gloss: that woman author-PL or woman inventor-PL-GEN many many be-GER-3POSS-ACC say-CVB look-PRES-1SG
annotation.eng: there were a lot of women songwriters, or women composers, I think.
For example later, the ones in the ’80s,

annotation.iu: he kucha xelq naxshilirining toplinishi, yighilishi,
annotation.seg: he kucha xelq naxshi-lir-i-ning topli-n-ish-i yigh-il-ish-i
annotation.gloss: uh Kucha(city) folk song-PL-3POSS-GEN gather-PASS-GER-3POSS gather-PASS-GER-3POSS
annotation.eng: in collecting, assembling Kucha’s folk music,
preserving it, they played an important role.

annotation.iu: Nisaxan Abduwéli yeni, Nisaxan Jéldir nami bilen kuchada.
annotation.seg: Nisaxan Abduwéli yeni Nisaxan Jéldir nam-i bilen kucha-da
annotation.eng: Nisaxan Abduwéli, that is, the one named Nisaxan Jéldir was in Kucha.

annotation.iu: Asasen naxshilarning köpinchisi shu ayal-- éytip-- qaldurghan,
annotation.seg: asasen naxshi-lar-ning köpinchi-si shu ayal éyt-ip qal-dur-ghan
annotation.gloss: basically song-PL-GEN majority-3POSS that woman sing-CVB remain-CAUS-PTCP.PST
annotation.eng: Essentially, the majority of songs, that woman sang and recorded.

annotation.iu: Emdi bezi naxshilirini özliri ijad qilghan dégendek.
annotation.seg: emdi bezi naxshi-lir-i-ni öz-lir-i ijad qil-ghan dé-gen-dek
annotation.gloss: now some song-PL-3POSS-ACC self-PL-3POSS creation do-PTCP.PST say-PTCP.PST-SIM
annotation.eng: And some songs she wrote herself.
in the field of women’s rights or women’s uh…
...arts, I don’t know most of them.
Since they’re really active at any kind of event--

annotation.iu: néme qilidighan, bolghanliqi üchünmiki deymen emdi.
annotation.seg: néme qil-idighan bol-ghan-liq-i üchün-miki de-y-men emdi
annotation.gloss: what do-PTCP.PRES be-PTCP.PST-DER-3POSS for-UNCERT say-PRES-1SG now
annotation.eng: what do you call it, that's why I say that.
The role of women was very-- strong,
even in the villages, women were stronger,

annotation.iu: héliqi bizning «yumulaq mehelle» dep kuchada bir...
annotation.seg: héliqi biz-ning yumulaq mehelle de-p kucha-da bir
annotation.gloss: that 1PL-GEN circular neighborhood say-CVB Kucha(city)-LOC one
annotation.eng: we had a store in Kucha called “Circular Neighborhood,”

annotation.iu: ashu kona, way kona yaghach köwrük bar chaghlarda,
annotation.seg: ashu kona way kona yaghach köwrük bar chagh-lar-da
annotation.gloss: that old wow old wooden bridge exist time-PL-LOC
annotation.eng: back in the times when that old, old wooden bridge was there,
it was set at the Kucha river bed,
from there a distance of maybe 200 meters,

annotation.iu: mangghan waqtida bir, mm, kichik bir da'ire barti.
annotation.seg: mang-ghan waqt-i-da bir mm kichik bir da'ire bar-ti
annotation.gloss: walk-PTCP.PST time-3POSS-LOC one mm small one scope exist-XPST
annotation.eng: when you went there, there was a little area,
it was blocked off like that,

annotation.iu: ayagh ong tereptin sol tereptin kirgili bolidighan,
annotation.seg: ayagh ong terep-tin sol terep-tin kir-gili bol-idighan
annotation.gloss: foot right(hand) side-ABL left(hand) side-ABL enter-PURP be-PTCP.PRES
annotation.eng: you could enter from the lower right side or left side,
there was a row of Kucha businesspeople.

annotation.seg: andin kéyin héliqi ushshaq chüshshek he
annotation.gloss: then after that tiny REDUP uh
annotation.eng: and then those uh small goods,

annotation.iu: andin kéyin awu baqqal dep bir héliqi köwrükning,
annotation.seg: andin kéyin awu baqqal de-p bir héliqi köwrük-ning
annotation.gloss: then after that fruit.seller say-CVB one that bridge-GEN
annotation.eng: and then the fruit sellers on the bridge's,

annotation.iu: aldida, yol yaqisida olturup, tuxum satidighan, nan satidighan,
annotation.seg: ald-i-da yol yaq-i-si-da oltur-up tuxum sat-idighan nan sat-idighan
annotation.gloss: front-3POSS-LOC road side-3POSS-3POSS-LOC sit-CVB egg sell-PTCP.PRES nan.bread sell-PTCP.PRES
annotation.eng: front side, sitting on the side of the road selling eggs, selling nan.
selling dried red dates and stuff,
the fruit sellers were basically like,

annotation.iu: bir tallam bir-- tokur... adem barti,
annotation.seg: bir tal-lam bir tokur adem bar-ti
annotation.gloss: one (measure word)-just one crippled.person person exist-XPST

annotation.eng: he was lame in one foot,
he was the only man selling dried fruit,
For us it seemed like sort of a strange,

annotation.iu: ayallarning arisigha kirip olturup bir nerse satidighandu»
annotation.seg: ayal-lar-ning ari-si-gha kir-ip oltur-up bir nerse sat-idighan-du
annotation.gloss: woman-PL-GEN middle-3POSS-DAT enter-CVB sit-CVB one thing sell-PTCP.PRES-3
annotation.eng: coming among all these women and sitting down to sell something?”
There was this kind of view that “fruit and small goods

annotation.iu: köz qarash barti, shu kichik waqtimizda.
annotation.seg: köz qarash bar-ti shu kichik waqt-imiz-da
annotation.gloss: eye view exist-XPST that small time-1PL.POSS-LOC
annotation.eng: (translated in a previous line), when we were little.

annotation.iu: qaq-ghorilarni qop qoyup, héliqi besh pungluq alsaq yérimini bölüp bérip,
annotation.seg: qaq ghori-lar-ni qo-p qoy-up héliqi besh pung-luq al-sa-q yérim-i-ni böl-üp bér-ip
annotation.gloss: dried.fruit apricot-PL-ACC put-CVB AUX.qoy-CVB that five cent-DER take-COND-1PL half-3POSS-ACC divide-CVB AUX.ber-CVB
annotation.eng: dried and fresh fruits, that uh, if we took a five-cent coin and divided it in half,

annotation.iu: birla er kishi barti, qalghan hemmisi xotun kishiti.
annotation.seg: bir-la er kishi bar-ti qal-ghan hemmi-si xotun kishi-ti
annotation.gloss: one-just man person exist-XPST remain-PTCP.PST all-3POSS woman person-XPST
annotation.eng: There was only one man, all the rest were women.

annotation.iu: Andin kéyin héliqi bashlanghuch ottura mekteplerning aldiliridimu,
annotation.seg: andin kéyin héliqi bashlanghuch ottura mektep-ler-ning ald-i-lir-i-di-mu
annotation.gloss: then after that primary center school-PL-GEN front-3POSS-PL-3POSS-LOC-INT
annotation.eng: And then the ones in front of the elementary and middle school,
the ones who were street peddlers,

annotation.iu: ettigende ashu ishi-- étizning ishi bashlanghuche,
annotation.seg: ettigen-de ashu ish-i étiz-ning ish-i bashla-n-ghu-che
annotation.gloss: morning-LOC that thing-3POSS field-GEN thing-3POSS begin-PASS-DESID-EQU
annotation.eng: In the morning that work-- until the farm work began,

annotation.iu: sütlirini séghip, qaymaqlirini, teyyarlap qoyghan qaymaqlirini élip, bazargha ekélip sétiwétip chiqip, andin kéyin balilirigha ash béridu.
annotation.seg: süt-lir-i-ni ségh-ip qaymaq-lir-i-ni teyyarla-p qoy-ghan qaymaq-lir-i-ni él-ip bazar-gha ekél-ip sét-iwét-ip chiq-ip andin kéyin bali-lir-i-gha ash bér-i-du
annotation.gloss: milk-PL-3POSS-ACC squeeze-CVB cream-PL-3POSS-ACC prepare-CVB AUX,qoy-PTCP.PST cream-PL-3POSS-ACC take-CVB market-DAT bring-CVB sell-INTENS-CVB AUX.chiq-CVB then after child-PL-3POSS-DAT food give-PRES-3
annotation.eng: , they milk the cows, and then bring the dairy products, the prepared dairy products to the market to sell, and then they feed the children.
only girls and women can work there.

annotation.iu: héliqi kona sheherge yéqin etraptiki yézilardin,
annotation.seg: héliqi kona sheher-ge yéqin etrap-tiki yézi-lar-din
annotation.gloss: that old city-DAT nearby vicinity-LOC.REL village-PL-ABL
annotation.eng: from the villages near the old city,

annotation.iu: kichik kichik qachilargha qaymaqlarni, tégige chong qachilarda qétiqlarni élip,
annotation.seg: kichik kichik qachi-lar-gha qaymaq-lar-ni tég-i-ge chong qachi-lar-da qétiq-lar-ni él-ip
annotation.gloss: small small bowl-PL-DAT cream-PL-ACC bottom-3POSS-DAT big bowl-PL-LOC yogurt-PL-ACC take-CVB
annotation.eng: Uh, they bring cream in tiny little bowls, and underneath was yogurt in big bowls,
all tied up with a scarf,

annotation.iu: ikki qolida kötürüp kirip destlap qoyup turup ashundaq satidighanti.
annotation.seg: ikki qol-i-da kötür-üp kir-ip destile-p qoy-up tur-up ashundaq sat-idighan-ti
annotation.gloss: two hand-3POSS-LOC lift-CVB enter-CVB stack-CVB put-CVB stand-CVB thus sell-PTCP.PRES-XPST
annotation.eng: they carry them in with two hands, stack them up and sell them like that.

annotation.iu: andin qétiqlarmu bir koy birla yérim koy etrapta bolidighanti adette.
annotation.seg: andin qétiq-lar-mu bir koy bir-la yérim koy etrap-ta bol-idighan-ti adette
annotation.gloss: then yogurt-PL-INT one kuai(Chinese yuan) one-just half kuai(Chinese yuan) vicinity-LOC be-PTCP.PRES-XPST usually
annotation.eng: and then yogurt was 1 yuan or 1.5 yuan or so usually.

annotation.iu: Héliqi kuchada asasen ettiginisi hemmisi qaymaq chay ichidughu adette,
annotation.seg: héliqi kucha-da asasen ettigin-i-si hemmi-si qaymaq chay ich-i-du-ghu adette
annotation.gloss: that Kucha(city)-LOC basically morning-3POSS-3POSS all-3POSS cream tea drink-PRES-3-CONF usually
annotation.eng: In Kucha basically everybody drinks tea with cream usually,

annotation.iu: Mawu ghulja tereplerde etken chay deydu,
annotation.seg: mawu Ghulja terep-ler-de et-ken chay de-y-du
annotation.gloss: this Ghulja(city) side-PL-LOC make-PTCP.PST tea say-PRES-3
annotation.eng: They call it milk tea around Ghulja,

annotation.iu: pishshiq qaymaq bilen qilidu ma kuchada?
annotation.seg: pishshiq qaymaq bilen qil-i-du ma kucha-da
annotation.gloss: cooked cream with do-PRES-3 this Kucha(city)-LOC
annotation.eng: Is it made with cooked cream in Kucha?
We used to make it that way at home too in the morning,

annotation.seg: méwe chéwi-ler tawuz pawuz ettigen u terep-ler-de
annotation.gloss: fruit REDUP-PL watermelon REDUP morning that side-PL-LOC
annotation.eng: fruit, melons and stuff in the morning there.

annotation.iu: qaymaq sélip, xam qaymaq, azraq tuz quyup, andin azraq süt quyup, andin kéyin qéniq demlanghan,
annotation.seg: qaymaq sél-ip xam qaymaq azraq tuz quy-up andin azraq süt quy-up andin kéyin qéniq demla-n-ghan
annotation.gloss: cream put-CVB raw cream a.little salt pour-CVB then a.little milk pour-CVB then after dark brew-PASS-PTCP.PST
annotation.eng: put the cream in, fresh cream, add a little salt, then a little milk, then pour strong-brewed…
black tea, that’s how we made it.
we’d say “oh the tea is ready,” or “it’s not ready,”
For example they’d make it like that when guests came.

annotation.iu: Rast, kuchada yene bir tamaqi bar, «shojir» dep qoyidu.
annotation.seg: rast kucha-da yene bir tamaq-i bar shojir de-p qoy-i-du
annotation.gloss: true Kucha(city)-LOC again one meal-3POSS exist shojir(food) say-CVB put-PRES-3
annotation.eng: Oh yeah, there was another kind of food in Kucha, they call it shojir.

annotation.iu: Uyghurche néme deydiken tang, bilmeymen emdi, uni héliqi...
annotation.seg: uyghur-che nim-e de-y-di-ken tang bil-me-y-men emdi u-ni héliqi
annotation.gloss: Uyghur-EQU what-dm say-PRES-3-EVID I.don't.know know-NEG-PRES-1SG now that-ACC that
annotation.eng: I don’t know how to say it in Uyghur, it’s like…

annotation.iu: Shojir dégen nedin kelgen tildin, bilmeymen, he'e.
annotation.seg: shojir dé-gen ne-din kel-gen til-din bil-me-y-men he'e
annotation.gloss: shojir(food) say-PTCP.PST where-ABL come-PTCP.PST language-ABL know-NEG-PRES-1SG yes
annotation.eng: Well, I don’t know what language 'shojir' comes from.
fry it up, pour some water,

annotation.iu: Asasen jiq sey-kö-- sey-köktat bolidu uningda he,
annotation.seg: asasen jiq sey kö-- sey köktat bol-i-du u-ning-da he
annotation.gloss: basically many vegetable * vegetable vegetable be-PRES-3 3SG-GEN-LOC uh
annotation.eng: Basically a lot of vegetables can go in it,

annotation.iu: bashqa héch qandaq nerse bolattimaydu he'e...
annotation.seg: bashqa héch qandaq nerse bol-at-t-i-ma-y-du he'e
annotation.gloss: other none how thing be-PST.HAB-PST-PRES-NEG-PRES-3 yes
annotation.eng: There wasn’t anything else in it...

annotation.iu: Buni shojir depchu shojur-- uningdin kéyin asas tamaq tartilidu.
annotation.seg: bu-ni shojir de-p-chu shojur u-ning-din kéyin asas tamaq tart-il-i-du
annotation.gloss: this-ACC shojir(food) say-CVB-TOP shojir(food) that-GEN-ABL after basis meal pull-PASS-PRES-3
annotation.eng: It was called shojir [xxx] [xxx]-- and after that the main dish is served.

annotation.iu: U tamaqlar tartilip bolghan, aningdin kéyin eng axirida héliqi,
annotation.seg: u tamaq-lar tart-il-ip bol-ghan a-ning-din kéyin eng axir-i-da héliqi
annotation.gloss: that food-PL pull-PASS-CVB be-PTCP.PST that-GEN-ABL after most end-3-LOC that
annotation.eng: Those foods were served- and then at the end um,
They’ve given up all those kinds of customs.
Well, they haven’t been forgotten yet.
If you go out to the villages they haven’t been forgotten.
When we went to Qum Eriq,

annotation.iu: shunchilik bi'aram bop ket-- bop kettim.
annotation.seg: shunchilik bi'aram bo-p ket-- bo-p ket-t-im

annotation.eng: But, it was also courtesy for guests.

annotation.iu: shojir tartip, shojirdin kéyin andin kéyin polo ekélip, néme qilidighan, chong méhmandarchiliqlarda shojirni yenilam ishlitidiken.
annotation.seg: shojir tart-ip shojir-din kéyin andin kéyin polo ekél-ip néme qil-idighan chong méhmandarchiliq-lar-da shojir-ni yeni-lam ishlit-i-di-ken
annotation.gloss: shojir(food) serve-CVB shojir(food)-ABL after then after pilaf bring-CVB what do-PTCP.PRES big hospitality-PL-LOC shojir(food)-ACC again-just use-PRES-3-EVID
annotation.eng: they serve shojir, after the shojir then they bring the pilaf, what do you call it, they use shojir when important guests come too.
It’s different out in the villages.
I can't say it was when I was really little,

annotation.iu: on töt on besh on alte on yette yash waqitlirimiz, emdi yash waqitlirimiz désekmu bolidu,
annotation.seg: on töt on besh on alte on yette yash waqit-lir-imiz emdi yash waqit-lir-imiz dé-se-k-mu bol-i-du
annotation.gloss: ten four ten five ten six ten seven years.old time-PL-1PL.POSS now young time-PL-1PL.POSS say-COND-1PL-INT be-PRES-3
annotation.eng: when we were 14, 15, 16, 17 years old, we could say it was when we were young,
in the old city area of Kucha,

annotation.iu: chonglarning bir némisi barti, «hajimlar olturushi» deydighan,
annotation.seg: chong-lar-ning bir némi-si bar-ti hajim-lar olturush-i de-ydighan
annotation.gloss: big-PL-GEN one what-3POSS exist-XPST pilgrim-PL party-3POSS say-PTCP.PRES
annotation.eng: the adults had this thing, they called it a 'haji gathering,'

annotation.iu: He, ottuz qiriq ashundaq chonglar yighilip he dastixan sélip qilidighan.
annotation.seg: he ottuz qiriq ashundaq chong-lar yigh-il-ip he dastixan sél-ip qil-idighan
annotation.gloss: uh thirty forty thus big-PL gather-PASS-CVB uh meal.for.guests put-CVB do-PTCP.PRES
annotation.eng: He, ottuz–qiriq ashundaq chonglar yighilip he dastixan sélip qilidighan.
The most essential dish they would make,

annotation.iu: héliqi «dümbe jiger» dep bir tamaq qilidighanti.
annotation.seg: héliqi dümbe jiger de-p bir tamaq qil-idighan-ti
annotation.gloss: that back liver say-CVB one meal do-PTCP.PRES-XPST

annotation.eng: It was the most essential food in those times.

annotation.iu: Yeni dümbe jiger dégen waqtida, héliqi jigerni pishurup,
annotation.seg: yeni dümbe jiger dé-gen waqt-i-da héliqi jiger-ni pish-ur-up
annotation.gloss: in.other.words back liver say-PTCP.PST time-3POSS-LOC that liver-ACC be.cooked-CAUS-CVB
annotation.eng: When they make dümbe jiger, they cook the liver,
chop it up finely, and then after that,

annotation.iu: qoyning resmiy quyruqining mayni pishurup, uni népiz késip töpige qoyup,
annotation.seg: qoy-ning resmiy quyruq-i-ning may-ni pish-ur-up u-ni népiz kés-ip töpi-ge qoy-up
annotation.gloss: sheep-GEN genuine tail-3POSS-GEN oil-ACC be.cooked-CAUS-CVB 3SG-ACC thin cut-CVB top-DAT put-CVB
annotation.eng: they cook the oil from the sheep’s tail, and they chop it up fnely and serve it right away,

annotation.iu: Her bir ademge bir texsidin élip,
annotation.seg: her bir adem-ge bir texsi-din él-ip
annotation.gloss: every one person-DAT one dish-ABL take-CVB
annotation.eng: They would take a plate to each person,

annotation.iu: Shu chaghlardiki eng dangliq tamaqti emdi ashu hajimlarning...yighilishida,
annotation.seg: shu chagh-lar-diki eng dangliq tamaq-ti emdi ashu hajim-lar-ning yighilish-i-da
annotation.gloss: that time-PL-LOC.REL most famous meal-XPST now that pilgrim-PL-GEN gathering-3POSS-LOC
annotation.eng: That was the most famous dish in those days for the haji gathering,

annotation.iu: héliqi, tamaqning aldida kélidighan tamiqi u emdi.
annotation.seg: héliqi tamaq-ning ald-i-da kél-idighan tamiq-i u emdi
annotation.gloss: that meal-GEN front-3POSS-LOC come-PTCP.PRES meal-3POSS 3SG now
annotation.eng: um, that was a dish that came before the meal.

annotation.iu: Emdi muhim, héliqi birlam emes emdi, muhim tamaqlarning birsi [xxx]...
annotation.seg: emdi muhim héliqi bir-lam emes emdi muhim tamaq-lar-ning bir-si [xxx]
annotation.gloss: now important that one-just not now important meal-PL-GEN one-3POSS [xxx]
annotation.eng: Important, um it wasn’t just one, it was one of the important dishes [xxx]…
a courtesy dish served for important guests,

annotation.iu: He, shu-- ayallarningki roli shu küchlükrek-- bolghan, meyli qaymaq bazirigha qarap baq[xxx], ettigen seher sa'et beshler bilen,
annotation.seg: he shu ayal-lar-ningki rol-i shu küchlük-rek bol-ghan meyli qaymaq bazir-i-gha qara-p baq-[xxx] ettigen seher sa'et besh-ler bilen
annotation.gloss: uh that woman-PL-GEN role-3POSS that powerful-COMP be-PTCP.PST no.matter cream market-3POSS-DAT look-CVB AUX.baq-[xxx] morning dawn hour five-PL with
annotation.eng: Yeah, the role of women was really strong, whether you look at the dairy market, or at five o’clock or something in the morning,
if you went out and looked in the streets,

annotation.iu: muj muj muj muj muj ayallar.
annotation.seg: muj muj muj muj muj ayal-lar

annotation.iu: béli tergen-- tergen ushshaq qizlar-- qizlargha, oghullarni körmeysen.
annotation.seg: bél-i ter-gen ter-gen ushshaq qiz-lar qiz-lar-gha oghul-lar-ni kör-me-y-sen
annotation.gloss: waist-3POSS collect-PTCP.PST collect-PTCP.PST tiny girl-PL girl-PL-DAT son-PL-ACC see-NEG-PRES-2SG.INF
annotation.eng: slender girls with their waists gathered up, you don’t see any boys.

annotation.iu: Pütün ashu pa-- héliqi er-- erkin pa'aliyette,
annotation.seg: pütün ashu pa-- héliqi er-- erkin pa'aliyet-te

annotation.seg: andin kéyin mundaq kech-lik héliqi gülxan yéq-ip meshrep qil-idighan yer-ler bar
annotation.gloss: then after thus evening-DER that bonfire kindle-CVB meshrep.party do-PTCP.PRES place-PL exist
annotation.eng: And then, that evening that, there were places where they would light bonfires and hold meshrep parties,

annotation.seg: bu gülxan yéq-ip undaq meshrep qil-idighan-ni
annotation.gloss: this bonfire kindle-CVB thus meshrep.party do-PTCP.PRES-ACC

annotation.seg: sen kichik-ing-de kucha-da chong bol-mi-ghan-dinkin bil-me-y-sen-de
annotation.eng: You didn’t know that because you didn’t grow up in Kucha?
The government has banned it now.

annotation.iu: He biz kichik waqtimizda [xxx] otturigha gülxan yéqip qoyup,
annotation.seg: he biz kichik waqt-imiz-da [xxx] otturi-gha gülxan yéq-ip qoy-up
annotation.gloss: uh 1PL small time-1PL.POSS-LOC [xxx] center-DAT bonfire kindle-CVB AUX.qoy-CVB

annotation.gloss: that now disappear-CVB AUX.ket-PST-3 that dance-3POSS
annotation.eng: they don’t have it anymore, that dance,

annotation.iu: mundaq dapni tutup bir birige chördilep,
annotation.seg: mundaq dap-ni tut-up bir bir-i-ge chördile-p
annotation.gloss: thus handheld.drum-ACC hold-CVB one one-3POSS-DAT encircle-CVB
annotation.eng: that one where the girls hold the 'dap' hand drums and go around each other in a circle,
What do you call it um,
They call it 'chélim oyuni', the instrument-playing game, yeah,

annotation.iu: U-- u-- he chélim oyuni deydu.
annotation.seg: u u he chélim oyun-i de-y-du

annotation.iu: Uni héliqi qizlar bilen qizlar, oghullar bilen qizlar mundaq oynaydu héliqi,
annotation.seg: u-ni héliqi qiz-lar bilen qiz-lar oghul-lar bilen qiz-lar mundaq oyna-y-du héliqi

annotation.iu: Dap tapalisa dap bilen, dap bolmisa héliqi, mawu puti bilen,
annotation.seg: dap tap-ali-sa dap bilen dap bol-mi-sa héliqi mawu put-i bilen
annotation.gloss: handheld.drum find-ABIL-COND handheld.drum with handheld.drum be-NEG-COND that this foot-3POSS with
annotation.eng: If they can find a 'dap' drum they dance with a dap, if there’s no dap, then they use their feet,

annotation.iu: Yaki bolmisa birer yaghliq he manda bir nerse bilen qilidighan.
annotation.seg: yaki bol-mi-sa birer yaghliq he manda bir nerse bilen qil-idighan
annotation.gloss: or be-NEG-COND a.certain headscarf uh thus one thing with do-PTCP.PRES
annotation.eng: Or otherwise do it with some kind of scarf or something like that.
They’d spin it around like this,

annotation.iu: tutquzmaqchi bolidu tutmaydu andin kéyin he,

annotation.iu: uni qoshaq bilen béyit éytip he…
annotation.seg: u-ni qoshaq bilen béyit éyt-ip he
annotation.eng: they’d sing folk songs and poems…
and then pull it back like that.
it was like that from long ago in Kucha,
the boys aren’t kept separate from the girls.
A man named Abdu-- Abdurazaq was a um,

annotation.iu: naxsha éytip qilidighan bir rehmetlik bir adem barti,

annotation.gloss: song sing-CVB do-PTCP.PRES one deceased one person exist-XPST

annotation.eng: A guy who livened up weddings.

annotation.seg: shu bir milliy saz guruppi-si shu chagh-lar-da
annotation.gloss: that one folk music group-3POSS that time-PL-LOC
annotation.eng: he had a…folk band in those days,

annotation.iu: uningdin bashqa héliqi saz guruppilirimu yoqtighu.
annotation.seg: u-ning-din bashqa héliqi saz guruppi-lir-i-mu yoq-ti-ghu
annotation.gloss: that-GEN-ABL other that music group-PL-3POSS-INT not.exist-XPST-CONF
annotation.eng: besides that one there weren’t any other folk music groups.
five or siz people were organized,
If we wanted to invite them to play,
we had to pay them in advance,

annotation.iu: Kéyin he pul tölep qoyup, toy bolidighan küni néme bolsap, yene birsi bérip,
annotation.seg: kéyin he pul töle-p qoy-up toy bol-idighan kün-i néme bol-sa-p yene bir-si bér-ip
annotation.gloss: after uh money pay-CVB AUX.qoy-CVB wedding be-PTCP.PRES day-3POSS what be-COND-?? again one-3POSS go-CVB
annotation.eng: Afterwards, you’d pay them their fee, then on the day of the wedding if something happened, someone else would go,

annotation.iu: undaq bolsa, uningkige baridighan qip qoyuptu shuninggha,
annotation.seg: undaq bol-sa u-ningki-ge bar-idighan qi-p qoy-upt-du shu-ning-gha
annotation.gloss: thus be-COND that-GEN-DAT exist-PTCP.PRES do-CVB AUX.qoy-PST.EVID-3 that-GEN-DAT
annotation.eng: in that case, that person who tried to go to him,
so we gave more money than they did,
That was in nineteen eighty- uh…

annotation.eng: In those days the late Abdurazaq
He was a really capable man [xxx].

annotation.iu: Bir ömür shu sahede ishlep ölüp ketti mana.

annotation.gloss: one lifespan that field-LOC work-CVB die-CVB leave-PST-3 look.here
annotation.eng: He worked in that field his whole life and then died.
There are a lot of artists like that.
There are a lot of natural artists in Kucha.
since that time passed these things started to be forgotten,
there was nobody writing them down,
If one thinks about them like this, they come to mind.

annotation.iu: Lékin bashqilardin, hazir yash balilardin sorisa héchkim uqmaydu ularni.

annotation.gloss: now this place-DAT go.up-PTCP.PST-since this place-LOC live-CVB stand-CVB

annotation.eng: it’s like, “Hey, it’s strange that at the time,
